name: Mission No. 18
description:
Drive the "Kuzmobil" through the cyberworld and defend yourself against hostile trolls to reach and unveil the mysterious giant box.

Made within a week as a surprise to my nephew, Markuz (Agent K), on his 18th birthday. He sure crushed them trolls, but they crushed him back! 😂
I was glad he had fun and liked it. 💜

So I went on to improve the game for three more (3) days so we can share this quirky game to you guys! 😄
